mapper.select: SELECT LABEL as label,bcch as bcch,BSIC as bsic from ( select DISTINCT c1.LABEL, c1.bcch , c1.BSIC from RNO_CELL c1, RNO_CELL c2 where c1.id <> c2.id and c1.LABEL<>c2.LABEL and c1.BCCH =c2.BCCH and c1.BSIC = c2.BSIC and c1.AREA_ID in ( select AREA_ID from RNO_GSM_SYS_AREA where PARENT_ID= #{cityId}) and c2.AREA_ID in ( select AREA_ID from RNO_GSM_SYS_AREA where PARENT_ID= #{cityId}) ORDER BY c1.bcch,c1.BSIC) where BCCH = #{bcch} and BSIC = #{bsic}

select DISTINCT c1.LABEL as label, c1.bcch as bcch, c1.bsic as bsic from RNO_CELL c1, RNO_CELL c2 where c1.id <> c2.id and c1.LABEL<>c2.LABEL and c1.BCCH =c2.BCCH and c1.BSIC = c2.BSIC and c1.AREA_ID in ( select AREA_ID from RNO_GSM_SYS_AREA where PARENT_ID= #{cityId}) and c2.AREA_ID in ( select AREA_ID from RNO_GSM_SYS_AREA where PARENT_ID= #{cityId}) ORDER BY c1.bcch,c1.BSIC
select * from RNO_NCELL where NCELL = #{sourceCell} and CELL in (select CELL from RNO_NCELL where NCELL = #{targetCell})
select * from RNO_NCELL where CELL = #{sourceCell} and NCELL = #{targetCell}
select wmsys.wm_concat(LONGITUDE||','||LATITUDE) as lonlats from RNO_CELL where LABEL = #{sourceCell} or LABEL = #{targetCell}
select area_id from RNO_GSM_SYS_AREA where NAME= #{areaName}
